trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPageEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanging" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示處理 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanging" /> 控制項之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanging> event when a pager button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Page") within the control is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanging>事件時的頁面巡覽區按鈕 (按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 頁面 」) 控制項內按一下時前,<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項負責的分頁作業。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the paging operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消分頁作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: Pager buttons are usually located in the pager row of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 頁面巡覽區按鈕通常位於中的頁面巡覽區列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPageEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPageEventHandler> 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPageEventHandler> delegate to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanging> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何以程式設計方式加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPageEventHandler>委派給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanging>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to declaratively add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPageEventHandler> delegate to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanging> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何以宣告方式將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPageEventHandler>委派給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanging>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。
